title: Wait For Me In Hell - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Slice of Life   Tragedy   Yaoi
author: SHIZU
description: Mamoru Asano, a homicide detective, investigates a case with Yuto Honma, a backup from the Community Safety Division. The two become attracted to each other as they spend time together. However, Asano still has the ring he was supposed to give his girlfriend five years after their breakup. Honma finds out about it. The two meet, and their love ends up with twists and turns...>
